## ValidControlSchemaMap type

Represents a map of properties from TForm with an associated control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValidControlSchemaMap<TForm extends object, TInputState extends object> = {
    [P in keyof TForm]: ValidControlSchema<TForm[P], TInputState>;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [ValidControlSchema](./dynamic-forms.validcontrolschema.md)
